summary: Pickle - Meet $Pickle, From Rugs to Riches, The mascot of green candles! Pickle is an original meme coin on Solana inspired by Matt Furie's iconic Boy's Club comic. Born from the ashes of ruthless self interest and disregard for our community, forged from the cauldron of fear and pain, on his own hero’s journey. His coin was recreated by the global community for the community, after the original developer rugged. A true CTO (community takeover) by a squad of moonlighting strangers spanning the entire globe, relaunched to ensure that the legacy of our beloved Pickle lives on. Come and join us for: In Pickle we Trust
